resources.string: Finnish-American software engineer who is the creator and, historically, the principal developer of the Linux kernel
He created the C programming language and, with long-time colleague Ken Thompson, the Unix operating system and B programming language.
Dutch programmer best known as the creator of the Python programming language, for which he was the "Benevolent dictator for life"
L.T. "Software is like sex: it's is better when it's free."
D.R. "UNIX is basically a simple operating system, but you have to be a genius to understand the simplicity.”
G.v.R. "If you decide to design your own language, there are thousands of sort of amateur language designer pitfalls."
